CLUE: The Roman emperor said to have made his horse a consul
FOUND IN: According to ancient sources, Caligula was known for his eccentric and tyrannical behavior, and one of his more bizarre acts was to appoint his favorite horse, Incitatus, to the Roman Senate as a consul

CLUE: Step up the ladder - called for
FOUND IN: Take the next rung (on a metaphorical ladder)
